findings.title: Improper Deposit Allowance Checking
findings.description: Deposits can still be made on curves not designed for more deposits, allowing an attacker to deposit and withdraw, causing unintended impact to token price and liquidity.

findings.title: Upgradability of Solana Program
findings.description: The program's upgrade authority can redeploy the program with malicious logic and gain unfair benefits from users, allowing them to transfer funds out from user accounts.

findings.title: Unchecked Account Rent Exemption
findings.description: Accounts can be deleted due to insufficient lamports for rent, locking the tokens of the liquidity providers and causing the users to be unable to swap within the pool.

findings.title: Use of Outdated Dependency
findings.description: The `saros-swap` uses outdated dependencies, which may have publicly known inherent bugs that can potentially cause damage to the program or its users.
